features: All-In-One Storage, Ready to Use - An all-in-one design makes it ultra-portable and accessible. Two transmitters and the receiver are pre-linked, charged, and securely stored in the charging case.
250m (820 ft.) Range - With a max transmission range of 250 meters (820 feet) in open, unobstructed environments, DJI Mic is ideal for scenarios like livestreaming, vlogging, and outdoor recording.
15-Hour Battery - Enjoy 5.5 hours of battery life from the transmitters, 5 hours from the receiver, and up to 15 hours with the charging case. Spend less time worrying about battery level.
Magnetic Attachment - Discreet, hideable, and suitable for coordinated recording, easily attach DJI Mic to clothing or other objects for flexible and convenient use in any environment.
OLED Touchscreen - The receiver has a built-in 0.95-inch OLED touchscreen for intuitive control of transmitter options along with access to brightness, volume, or battery level information.

14-Hour Recording - 8GB of internal storage can handle up to 14 hours of 48kHz 24-bit audio without compression. It can record separately and output audio files quickly to a computer using a data cable.
body.description: Overview DJI's wireless lavalier microphone system delivers exceptional sound quality and dual-channel recording at long-range distances. The mic system consists of two microphone transmitters, a receiver, and an ultra-compact charging case. Features seamless compatibility with smartphones, cameras, DJI Osmo Action 3, and DJI Osmo Mobile 6, letting you record crystal-clear audio for vlogs, livestreaming, outdoor scenes, and more. Features Safety Track A secondary audio track is recorded as a backup with a volume of -6 dB. This helps to safeguard your audio should the loss of sound be caused by problems such as overexposure. Multi-level Gain Control Adjust input and output sensitivity between -12dB ~ 12dB and find the perfect setting for your surrounding. Microphone Windscreen Effectively suppresses wind and noisy environments while still recording clear sound. Install on Hot and Cold Shoes Attach the wireless mic receiver to your DSLR camera, mirrorless camera, or smartphone bracket and capture flawless footage to match the audio. In the Box DJI Mic Receiver ×1 DJI Mic Transmitter ×2 DJI Mic Charging Case ×1 DJI Mic Camera Audio Cable (3.5mm TRS) ×1 DJI Mic Mobile Phone Adapter (Type-C) ×1 DJI Mic Mobile Phone Adapter (Lightning) ×1 DJI Mic Windscreen ×2 DJI Mic Clip Magnet ×2 DJI Mic Carrying Pouch ×1 DJI Mic Hot Shoe Adapter ×1 Charging Cable ×1 Instruction Manual ×1 Notes 1. Tested in an obstruction-free outdoor environment. 2. Tested with 2 transmitters connected to the receiver, without backup recording, and the receiver connected to a camera. 3. Tested with a 48,000Hz sampling rate and 24-bit mono WAV audio format.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Magnetic Attachment The transmitter has a convenient back clip and magnetic design for easy attachment to clothes, ensuring it's always ready for instant use. Clip On and Record Each transmitter has a convenient back-clip that can be easily attached to clothes and other objects. Easy to Mount With the hot shoe adapter, attach the receiver to your DSLR camera, mirrorless camera, or smartphone bracket and capture flawless footage to match the audio.

14-Hour Recording [3] With 8 GB of internal storage, record up to 14 hours of compressionless 48kHz 24-bit audio and output files quickly to a computer via data cable. Microphone Windscreen Effectively suppresses wind and noisy environments while still recording clear sound. Multi-level Gain Control Adjust input and output sensitivity between -12dB ~ 12dB and find the perfect setting for your surrounding.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A Game-Changer for Audio Recording – Effortless, Versatile, and High-Quality
reviews.reviewText: I've been using the DJI Mic system, and it has revolutionized the way I record audio. The ease of use is the first thing that stands out. It's incredibly user-friendly, setting up in no time and beginning to record instantly once configured to do so. This feature is invaluable, as it ensures that I never miss a crucial audio moment in my recordings.The slim design of the microphones is a major plus. They are unobtrusive and can be attached without drawing unnecessary attention, which is essential in maintaining the visual aesthetics of any video production. Additionally, the ability to add a lav mic offers even more flexibility, catering to different recording situations.The battery life is another area where this system truly shines. It lasts incredibly long, reducing the need for frequent recharging and providing peace of mind during extended recording sessions. The option to record directly on both mics or use them for a stereo setup adds a layer of versatility that any audio professional or enthusiast would appreciate.Using these mics with my iPhone 15 Pro has been seamless. The direct compatibility with smartphones makes it a highly convenient tool for mobile content creators. The magnetic shirt attachment is a standout feature - it's strong, reliable, and coupled with the mic's lightweight design, it's easy to forget you're even wearing it.However, a couple of pieces of advice for new users: First, set the microphone to automatically start recording when taken out of the case. This ensures you're always ready to capture audio without any delay. Second, consider adjusting the light brightness in the settings. The lights on the mics, while useful, can be a bit distracting in videos, so dimming them can help maintain the focus on the subject.In conclusion, the DJI Mic system is an outstanding choice for anyone looking for an easy-to-use, versatile, and high-quality audio recording solution. Its user-friendly features, combined with excellent audio quality and compatibility with modern devices like the iPhone 15 Pro, make it an invaluable tool for both professional and amateur audio and video production.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent sound, portable and crazy battery life
reviews.reviewText: They are a little pricey, but it’s very worth it. I have now gone through several different brands of Bluetooth mics and these are by far the clear winner. Clean sound, very natural voices, minimal background pick up, and none of that whispery white noise that I have experienced in some others. The magnetic clips are genius, and even if I clip it this way totally hidden under somebody’s shirt and don’t add a lav mic, the sound is great and doesn’t pick up much clothing rustle. The controls are intuitive, and the fact that each mike is also a dedicated recorder is absolutely outstanding. Build quality is extremely pleasing, from the case to the units themselves. Battery holds a charge, basically forever, and charge quickly. Overall, this is an excellent set that anybody can just throw in their bag for content, interviews and more.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great set up but beware if you want to use Lavalier mics with this
reviews.reviewText: This is a wonderful system. The little adapters for iPhone (lightening connector) and USB-C are great additions… as are the magnets that allow for clean placement of the mics. The touch screen on the receiver is nice but a little difficult to navigate at times. The sound quality is excellent. The biggest problem was finding the right lapel mic to pair with it. Most lapel mics bring “noise” when plugged into these transmitters. After trying several… it seems the Shure MVL lavalier mic works the best with this unit. If that is the way you are going to use this mic… those lavs add another $70 each, so that adds $140 to your set up. The battery life seems to be a little shorter than stated in the listing… but I rarely push it to the limits, so that is not an issue for me. Overall, I love the DJI Mic. It’s simple to use and brings great sound. I would definitely buy it again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Game Changer in Audio Recording
reviews.reviewText: The DJI Mic (2 TX + 1 RX + Charging Case) is an absolute game-changer for creators looking to elevate their audio recording quality. As a content creator, I have struggled with finding the perfect audio solution, but my search is over. DJI has outdone themselves with this intuitive and versatile wireless microphone system.With two transmitters and a receiver, this system allows for seamless dual-mic setups, ideal for interviews, podcasts, or capturing multiple audio sources. The sound quality is outstanding, capturing crisp and clear audio, while minimizing background noise. I was particularly impressed with the range and performance of the wireless connection, providing me the freedom to move and capture audio without any dropouts or interference.The charging case is an ingenious addition, offering not only protection and organization for the components but also doubling as a charging station. With its compact design, I can easily toss it in my bag and have my DJI Mic system ready to go whenever inspiration strikes.DJI's user-friendly interface and easy setup process make using the DJI Mic a breeze, even for those not well-versed in audio equipment. The OLED display on the receiver offers quick access to settings, battery life, and audio levels, ensuring optimal performance.In conclusion, the DJI Mic (2 TX + 1 RX + Charging Case) is an unparalleled audio solution for content creators seeking professional-grade audio quality with incredible ease of use. It's an investment that will undoubtedly elevate your audio game and provide a premium user experience. Highly recommended!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This wireless mic set by DJI works perfectly
reviews.reviewText: I used it in all kinds of environments and this wireless mic set by DJI is a professional mic setup. It captures voice in e.g. interviews with clarity and eliminates wind noise with the "dead cat" on. The mics are lightweight and very practical to use. Although somewhat expensive it's well worth the investment.
He utilizado varias marcas de micrófonos para crear contenidos y definitivamente DJI es top en todos sus productos.No son los micros más baratos, pero definitivamente vale la pena la inversión.

reviews.reviewTitle: Lo mejor en microfonos del mercado
reviews.reviewText: La calidad de este microfono tanto el receptor como transmisor son sublimes hasta el momento no tengo problema alguno y les digo DJI es garantia de calidad se los recomiendo mucho.

🎤 The DJI Mic is a highly sophisticated wireless lavalier microphone system that offers exceptional performance and reliability. 💪 With a range of 250m (820 ft.), it provides ample coverage for a variety of applications, including recording interviews, vlogs, and more.🔋 The DJI Mic comes with a charging case, 2 TX and 1 RX, and boasts a 15-hour battery life, ensuring that you have enough power to last through even the longest recording sessions. 🔇 The microphone features noise cancellation, providing clear audio even in noisy environments.💻 Compatible with a wide range of devices, including PC, iPhone, and Android, the DJI Mic is an ideal choice for content creators, journalists, and anyone who needs a high-quality wireless microphone.📅 I was fortunate enough to purchase the DJI Mic on the day it was launched and I've been using it for almost a year now with no problems. The system is easy to set up and use, and I've been consistently impressed with the quality of the audio it captures.🌟 I highly recommend the DJI Mic to anyone who needs a reliable, high-performance wireless microphone system. With its long battery life, noise cancellation, and wide compatibility, it is an excellent investment for anyone looking to capture high-quality audio for their content. 💯 The DJI Mic is an absolute must-have for content creators and journalists! 🎉
